# test that chezmoi add --template-symlinks-home replaces absolute symlinks, pointing to files inside home, with templates
cd $HOME

chezmoi add --template-symlinks-home .symlink_absolute
exec cat $CHEZMOISOURCEDIR/symlink_dot_symlink_absolute.tmpl
stdout '{{ .chezmoi.homedir }}/.dir/subdir/file'
